Intro to Deep Learning

This document provides an introduction to deep learning, covering topics such as information theory, neural networks, activation functions, loss functions, and network training. It is based on lectures by Raanan Fattal and Matan Halfon, and is intended for informal study.

Key Concepts:

  • Introduction to Deep Learning
  • Information Theory
  • Neural Network Models
  • Perceptron and Multi Layer Perceptron
  • Activation Functions and Loss Functions
  • Network Training and Optimization
  • Image-To-Image Translation
  • Generative Model Evaluation
  • Conditional GAN generator
  • Generative Latent Optimization
Deep Learning Neural Networks Entropy Cross-Entropy Perceptron Multi Layer Perceptron Activation Function Loss Function Gradient Descent SGD
